department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
**Cloudvisory Renewal**
=====================================

**Number:** PW-EEM-059-41088

**Status:** Expired

**Public Notice**
----------------

The Government of Canada invites all interested suppliers to submit a bid for the Cloudvisory Renewal tender.

**Notice Type**
----------------

* Language: English and French
* Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Category: Goods and Services
* Region: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

**Project Description:**
-------------------------

The Treasury Board of Canada requires a renewal of the Cloudvisory solution. The cloud-based service is expected to support the delivery of cloud-enabled services to the Government of Canada and its entities.

**Key Details:**
----------------

* Reference Number: PW-EEM-059-41088
* Solicitation Number: 24062-230058/A
* Publication Date: August 29, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 11, 2022 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A
* Location: Terrasses de la Chaudière, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**Solicitation Process:**
-------------------------

The tender will be awarded based on a competitive procurement strategy, with the best overall proposal selected. Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Selection Criteria:**
-----------------------

* Technical Merit
* Price

**Trade Agreements:**
--------------------

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

Name: Wiafe, Kwesi
Email: [kwesi.wiafe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kwesi.wiafe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 522-0302
Fax: N/A
Address: Terrasses de la Chaudière, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**Attachments:**
-----------------

Refer to the following attachments for more information:

* [Cloudvisory Renewal Guideline (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/bbe2ea91c78b2ed5c7aed3f31664
